trans-unit.source: Represents a control primitive that handles the positioning and sizing of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control and two <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> controls that are used to set a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>.
trans-unit.target: 表示控制項之基本項目之位置與大小的<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref>控制項及兩個<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref>用來設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>的控制項

trans-unit.source: The Track control does not have a default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: 追蹤控制項沒有預設值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: Its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> is implemented as part of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> controls.
trans-unit.target: 其<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>實作的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: The Track has a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control and two <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls that are used to change the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> property of the Track control.
trans-unit.target: 音軌有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>控制項及兩個<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>控制項，可用來變更<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>追蹤控制項的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows a Track on a slider.
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示滑桿上的追蹤記錄。

trans-unit.source: **A Track on a Slider** ![RepeatButton, Thumb](~/add/media/trackonslider.png "RepeatButton, Thumb") The following table shows the Track properties and the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> properties that they automatically bind to.
trans-unit.target: **滑桿上的追蹤**![RepeatButton、 縮圖](~/add/media/trackonslider.png "RepeatButton、 縮圖")下表顯示追蹤屬性和對應<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>自動繫結到的內容。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>

trans-unit.source: When either property changes, the bound property also changes.
trans-unit.target: 當任一屬性變更時，繫結的屬性也會變更。

trans-unit.source: |Track property|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> property| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| The following table shows the Track properties and the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> properties to which they bind when a Track is part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control and the Track properties are not explicitly set.
trans-unit.target: |追蹤屬性 |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>屬性 | |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| 下表顯示追蹤屬性和對應<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>屬性要繫結追蹤記錄時的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>未明確設定控制和追蹤屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>

trans-unit.source: |Track property|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> property| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| The following table shows the Track properties and the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> properties to which they bind when a Track is part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control and the Track properties are not explicitly set.
trans-unit.target: |追蹤屬性 |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>屬性 | |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| 下表顯示追蹤屬性和對應<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>屬性要繫結追蹤記錄時的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>未明確設定控制和追蹤屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>

trans-unit.source: |Track property|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> property| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| Additionally, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> properties for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control bind with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> properties for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls of the Track control.
trans-unit.target: |追蹤屬性 |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>屬性 | |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| 此外，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>控制<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>控制項繫結<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>追蹤控制項的控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>

trans-unit.source: When a Track is used to scroll content, the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control is proportional to the percentage of the content that appears in the viewable area or viewport.
trans-unit.target: 使用追蹤來捲動時，內容的大小<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>控制項是成比例的內容，會出現在檢視區的可檢視區域的百分比。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows an example of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> control that implements a Track control.
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示的範例<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>實作追蹤控制項的控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: **A ScrollBar that has a Track control** ![ScrollBar illlustration](~/add/media/scrollbargeneric.png "ScrollBar illlustration") The following calculation is used to compute the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>.
trans-unit.target: **捲軸的追蹤控制**![捲軸圖例](~/add/media/scrollbargeneric.png "捲軸圖例")下列計算用於計算<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>大小

trans-unit.source: thumbSize = (viewportSize/(maximum–minimum+viewportSize))×trackLength The viewportSize parameter is the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 縮圖大小 = viewportSize 參數為的值 (viewportSize/(maximum–minimum+viewportSize)) × trackLength<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The maximum and minimum parameters correspond to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A> property values.
trans-unit.target: 最大和最小參數會對應至<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A>屬性值。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of the expression maximum–minimum+viewportSize is the size of the scrollable content.
trans-unit.target: 最大運算式的值 – 最小 + viewportSize 是可捲動內容的大小。

trans-unit.source: Note that the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> property represents the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> of the Track when the content is scrolled to the bottom.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A>屬性代表<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>的追蹤時內容捲動至底部。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A>

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> value is not the same as the length or extent of the content.
trans-unit.target: 這<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A>值不是相同的長度或範圍的內容當做。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a more detailed explanation, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需的更詳細的說明，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> of a Track in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> increases from top to bottom or from left to right depending on the orientation of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>的追蹤中<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>會增加從上到下或從左到右的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>的方向而定</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> of a Track in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> increases from bottom to top or from left to right depending on the orientation of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A><xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>會增加從下至上或從左到右根據<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>方向</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>中的追蹤</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: To change the direction of increasing value, set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A> property of the Track to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要變更增加值的方向，設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A>屬性軌到`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Creates the layout for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 建立的配置<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The area that is provided for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 提供區域<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> to use for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> content.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref>用於<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>內容。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> that decreases the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*> property of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> ，減少<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>屬性<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control is in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> bind to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>控制項處於<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>控制項，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>控制項<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>繫結至<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> that reduces the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> control when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> is pressed.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> ，以減少<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>的<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>負責控制何時<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref>按下。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The default is a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> control that has default settings.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref>均為預設值的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets the child of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 取得子系<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>指定索引處。

trans-unit.source: You specify the child elements of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 您指定之子項目的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>藉由設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The child elements are indexed in the order that the properties are set.
trans-unit.target: 子項目會設定屬性的順序進行索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the child.
trans-unit.target: 子系的索引。

trans-unit.source: Returns the object of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> at the specified index in the list of visual child elements.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的物件<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> visual 的子項目清單中指定索引處。

trans-unit.source: The index must be a number between zero (0) and the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.VisualChildrenCount*> property minus one (1).
trans-unit.target: 索引必須是零 (0) 的值之間的數字<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.VisualChildrenCount*>減一 (1) 的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.VisualChildrenCount*>

trans-unit.source: The specified index is greater than the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.VisualChildrenCount*> property minus one (1).
trans-unit.target: 指定的索引的值大於<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.VisualChildrenCount*>減一 (1) 的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.VisualChildrenCount*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> that increases the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*> property of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref>增加<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>屬性<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>類別</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control is in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> bind to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>控制項處於<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>控制項，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>控制項<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>繫結至<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> that increases the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> control when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> is pressed.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref>增加<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>的<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>負責控制何時<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref>按下。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The default is a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> control that has default settings.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref>均為預設值的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the direction of increasing <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*> is reversed from the default direction.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定是否增加的方向<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>從預設的方向相反。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>

trans-unit.source: When the value of IsDirectionReversed is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> exchange places.
trans-unit.target: 當 IsDirectionReversed 的值設定為`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A>中<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>交換上的芳鄰。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> values increase from left to right for both horizontal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>值增加從左到右的這兩個水平<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> values for a vertical <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> increase from top to bottom, whereas for a vertical <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> these values increase from bottom to top.
trans-unit.target: 不過，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>垂直值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>而，增加從上到下，為垂直<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>這些值增加從下至上。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: When you set the IsDirectionReversed property to `true`, the direction of increasing value reverses.
trans-unit.target: 當您將 IsDirectionReversed 屬性設`true`，增加值的方向會反轉。

trans-unit.source: If you implement a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control and you do not explicitly set the IsDirectionReversed property, the IsDirectionReversed property binds to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您實作<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>一部分<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>控制項，而且您沒有明確設定 IsDirectionReversed 屬性、 IsDirectionReversed 屬性繫結至<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton*> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton*> exchanged positions and the direction of increasing value is reversed; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<> *> 和<> *> 交換的位置和增加值的方向就會反轉，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed*>

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別項<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum possible <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定最大的可能<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>的<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control is in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> control and the Maximum property is not explicitly set, this property automatically binds with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>控制項處於<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>未明確設定控制和最大值屬性，這個屬性會自動繫結與<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The Maximum value for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control is equivalent to the size of the scrollable content minus the size of the visible content area or viewport.
trans-unit.target: 最大值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>控制項相當於減去可見內容區域的檢視區大小的可捲動內容的大小。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the size of the content is 100 and the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> property is 30, the value of the Maximum property is 70.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果內容的大小是 100 和大小的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>屬性為 30，最大值屬性的值就是 70。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is true because the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control corresponds to the position in the scrollable content that appears at the top of the viewport.
trans-unit.target: 這是 true 因為<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>控制項對應中會出現在檢視區上方的可捲動內容的位置。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the content is scrolled to the very bottom in this example, 30 percent of the content still appears in the viewport.
trans-unit.target: 當內容捲動至最底部，在此範例中時，30%的內容仍會出現在檢視區。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> that corresponds to the top of the viewport is 70, and the Maximum value is 70.
trans-unit.target: 因此，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>對應的檢視區上方是 70，和最大值是 70。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows how the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> corresponds to a position in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> control.
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示如何<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>對應中的位置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the remarks for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱備註<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>

trans-unit.source: To explicitly define the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>, create an object that derives from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> class and provide overrides for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.MeasureOverride%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ArrangeOverride%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要明確定義的大小<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>，請建立衍生自的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>類別，並提供覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.MeasureOverride%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ArrangeOverride%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ArrangeOverride%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.MeasureOverride%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>物件</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: If you implement a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control and you do not explicitly set the ViewportSize property, the ViewportSize property binds to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您實作<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>一部分<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>控制項，而且您沒有明確設定 ViewportSize 屬性、 ViewportSize 屬性繫結至<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The value of the ViewportSize property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control that is implemented in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control is always <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName>, because the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control does not change size.
trans-unit.target: ViewportSize 屬性值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>控制項中實作<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>控制項一律是<xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName>，因為<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>控制項不會變更大小。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> </xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`||

trans-unit.source: The size of the visible area of the scrollable content.
trans-unit.target: 可捲動內容的可見區域大小。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.Double?displayProperty=fullName>, which means that the content size is not defined.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref:System.Double?displayProperty=fullName>，也就未定義內容的大小。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize*>

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別項<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of child elements of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得子項目的數目<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: You specify the child elements of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 您指定之子項目的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>藉由設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The child elements are indexed in the order that the properties are set.
trans-unit.target: 子項目會設定屬性的順序進行索引。

trans-unit.source: An integer between 0 and 2 that specifies the number of child elements in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 介於 0 和 2 中的子項目數目之間的整數<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>。
